channel.title: Secure Client
channel.description: Hi .I am using project skillz client to add some items into my server. But if i send that client to my firend. And he is going to edit that server, and then he will compile and save the server. Does it effect in everyones client? So i would like to make my client source uneditable for others. Is this possible

item.title: Secure Client
item.dc:creator: @killmoon1 killmoon1
item.description:
@killmoon1 wrote:

[quote=“Exiled-Isle, post:2, topic:237137”]Killmoon it is possible but i recommend (right click desktop) > New > Folder (Name : I.E What ever your server name is so E.G Nova pk Backup So if you mess anything up you have another copy. So open your current file and delete all the java files.

Oh and if you send it to him, and he compiles it won’t affect anyone ;)[/quote]

Oh ok , anyways my problem got solved, i just made .JAR client from my server client. And there are not any extra buttons , like “add model” button.

Read full topic

item.title: Secure Client
item.dc:creator: @Exiled-Isle Exiled-Isle
item.description:
@Exiled-Isle wrote:

Killmoon it is possible but i recommend (right click desktop) > New > Folder (Name : I.E What ever your server name is so E.G Nova pk Backup So if you mess anything up you have another copy. So open your current file and delete all the java files.

Oh and if you send it to him, and he compiles it won’t affect anyone

Read full topic
